io.doov.core.dsl.mapping

Class TypeContextConverters

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.doov.core.dsl.mapping.TypeContextConverters

  • public class TypeContextConverters
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory methods of context-aware TypeConverters. Seperated from TypeConverters to avoid function signature collusion
